sentences.english: Fanny had not felt so comfortable for days and days.
sentences.chinese: 範妮多少天來從沒這樣心情舒暢過。

sentences.english: Oily skin after bathing, every mind and the body fluent in its landscaping.
sentences.chinese: 洗浴後皮膚油膩，渾身舒暢，氣血通順，心曠神怡。

sentences.english: Joyfully swimming in your clear waves.
sentences.chinese: 舒暢地穿梭在你的清波。

sentences.english: That falls in well with mine, and certes brought.
sentences.chinese: 那天裏，的確給我帶來滿懷的喜悅和舒暢。

sentences.english: Be happy. When you don't have what you want
sentences.chinese: 保持心情舒暢。如果你得不到你想要的

sentences.english: I stand up, fluff the hair, mood because of enough sleep .
sentences.chinese: 我站起來，抖抖毛，因爲睡足了覺而心情舒暢。

sentences.english: Humor in times of stress, however, clearly makes us feel better.
sentences.chinese: 在受到壓力時保持幽默，無疑會使我們心情舒暢。

sentences.english: It helps you keep fit and makes you happier.
sentences.chinese: 它可以強身健體，令你心情舒暢。

sentences.english: Greet me and make me feel comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎我，使我感到心情舒暢。

sentences.english: Do we do what makes us feel good now?
sentences.chinese: 我們做能讓我們現在就感覺心情舒暢的？

sentences.english: I like the weather with sunshine because sunny weather make people pleasant and happy.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡晴朗的天氣因爲明媚的陽光使人心情舒暢。

sentences.english: When I started to feel feverish, I enjoyed it.
sentences.chinese: 當我開始感到輕微發燒時，我的心情很舒暢。

sentences.english: In the mountains, there you feel free.
sentences.chinese: 在山坳中，你會感到很舒暢。

sentences.english: Pleasant hot water pours out of the mouths of dragon-like creatures into three pools.
sentences.chinese: 舒暢的熱水進入三個池之內從像龍一樣人的嘴溢出。

sentences.english: On a fine spring day like this I feel quite carefree.
sentences.chinese: 在春光明媚的日子裏，我感到非常舒暢。

sentences.english: My soul hungers and thirsts for the refreshment of thy presence.
sentences.chinese: 我靈飢渴，唯有禰的同在才能使我舒暢。

definition: confident and at ease/free and easy
firmly-based/steady/steadfast/to have peace of mind/free from anxiety/Taiwan pr. [ta4 shi2]
